text: Vincenzo Blo (12 March 1888 - 5 July 1967) was an Italian gymnast. He competed in the men's team event at the 1908 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1888 births Category:1967 deaths Category:Italian male artistic gymnasts Category:Olympic gymnasts of Italy Category:Gymnasts at the 1908 Summer Olympics Category:People from Ferrara
title: Vincenzo Blo
